title: Anubis Cosmetics font
content:
Anybody? I believe it's custome but I'm not sure.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [anubis\_font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120426200216/http:/typophile.com/files/anubis_font.jpg) | 16.4 KB |
author: Chris82

comments.content:
Indeed, modified, and a bit clumsily at that.

If you'd like a fully featured and expanded Barmeno-like typeface please check [FF Sari](http://web.archive.org/web/20120426200216/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=FF+Sari), the vastly improved version of this classic typeface by its original designer [Hans Reichel](http://web.archive.org/web/20120426200216/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hans%20Reichel), available in OpenType Pro. ;^)

\> _Glyphpusher!_

LOL :^D

Yup, I share the title with Stewf now. ;^)
